member.name: UDP_TABLE_CLASS
member.summary: The UDP_TABLE_CLASS enumeration defines the set of values used to indicate the type of table returned by calls to .

member.name: UDP_TABLE_CLASS.UDP_TABLE_BASIC
member.summary: A structure that contains all UDP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: UDP_TABLE_CLASS.UDP_TABLE_OWNER_PID
member.summary: A or structure that contains all UDP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.

member.name: UDP_TABLE_CLASS.UDP_TABLE_OWNER_MODULE
member.summary: A or structure that contains all UDP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
